sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Box, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import { SelectBinded,ButtonSave, ButtonCancel, gridMessageError, EditTextBinded, BackdropLoading, gridMessageSuccess } from '../customHooks/customComponents'; export const Presentational=( { dataUser, setDataUser, onChangeInput, submitForm, backList, response, loading, error, message, userDetails })=>{ return (
{BackdropLoading(loading)} { userDetails.profile_id===3?"Perfil de Usuario":"Mantenimiento de Usuarios" } {error && {gridMessageError(error)} } {(response && response.success===false) && {gridMessageError(response.error)} } {(response && response.success===true) && {gridMessageSuccess("")} } {EditTextBinded("first_name", "Nombre", dataUser.first_name, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("last_name", "Apellido(s)", dataUser.last_name, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("email", "Email", dataUser.email, onChangeInput, loading,"email")} {EditTextBinded("phone", "Teléfono", dataUser.phone, onChangeInput, loading,"phone")} {SelectBinded("profile_id", "Rol",[{id:1,name:"Administrador"},{id:2,name:"Bibliotecario"},{id:3,name:"Lector"}] , dataUser.profile_id, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("password", "Password", dataUser.password, onChangeInput, loading, "password")} {EditTextBinded("confirm_password", "Confirme Password", dataUser.confirm_password, onChangeInput, loading, "password")} {ButtonSave("Guardar", submitForm, loading)} {ButtonCancel("Cancelar", backList, loading)}
); };
